name: MultiMediaMonster Fancy captcha
author: MultiMediaMonster, Renske van der Heijden

sections.description: The plugin adds a fancy drag and drop (or click on mobile and tablets) captcha field to specific forms you choose by inserting the tag, classname or for example id as a selector and a form tag as to where the captcha should be displayed. The plugin is mainly based on javascript and jQuery and is absolutely random in it’s functionality. The plugin is also compatible for tablets and smartphones on wich you cannot drag and drop. On those you just click … Ps: the screenshots are in Dutch but the base plugin language is English.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Click on the menu item thats was added and change your settings as you please
  4. Are you interested in a fill functional version where you can change the names and images? You can buy this for a small price on my own website http://www.multimediamonster.nl.
sections.faq:
Do you have any questions?

Please send them to me and I will fix the problem or add the question here.
